Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Relates to authorizing and directing the metropolitan transportation authority to implement a free fare program for NYC EMTs and paramedics on public transit systems
Summary: Relates to authorizing and directing the metropolitan transportation authority to implement a free fare program for NYC EMTs and paramedics on public transit systems, the LIRR and Metro-North railroad.
LawCode: Amd ยง1266, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to authorizing and directing the metropolitan transportation authority to implement a free fare program for emergency medical technicians and paramedics
